name: Sector 0
description: You're a test subject, placed in a world where you have to survive against hoards of zombies. You are given 650 dollars to purchase a weapon of your choosing and some ammo. Your goal is to survive as long as you can and to kill as many zombies as possible. The more zombies you kill, the more money you get, so you can obtain new weapons and specialties to use against them. (Keep in mind, this game is still in early development so please report any bugs or glitches  if you can, thanks) you can email me at, @dillonj4682@gmail.com This game was made in Unity 2020.2.2f1. Zombie Arcade, FPS
